message: Election hack? What exactly did they hack?...Oh you mean the emails exposing all of Clinton and Podesta and the DNC's shady business?.... I thought that was the news media's job to expose corruption....

This is all because the gvmt can't support the economy with tax.dollars that are dwindling due to low paying jobs. This is the program that Bernie Sanders wants.for the USA. The only reason that your pastor is not another Joel Osteen is because he can't find parishioners rich enough to put him in those digs. Every single opportunity that a preacher gets to make himself rich off of your tythes, he will take it, and there is nothing that the law will do about it. That opportunity to get rich off of an invisible product is one of the main reasons that religion was invented in the first place. And why do you think that you know Christianity better than anyone else? You are going off of the same book that Benny Hinn goes off of, and other millionaire preachers use to justify skimming. Don't be so sure that you have found the right way. You are basing your opinion off of the same bogus book that they are.
